1 fourth open square brackets square root of negative x squared plus 0 comma 6 x plus 0 comma 27 end root plus fraction numerator left parenthesis negative 2 x plus 0 comma 6 right parenthesis left parenthesis x plus 0 comma 3 right parenthesis over denominator 2 square root of negative x squared plus 0 comma 6 x plus 0 comma 27 end root end fraction close square brackets
